content.content: 1. (1) The following forms are prescribed as the required forms for the purposes indicated: 1. Form 1: the notice to the clerk of the local municipality that the owner desires fence-viewers to view and arbitrate under subsection 4 (1) of the Act. 2. Form 2: the notice by the clerk of a municipality or by another designated person to an owner or occupant that he or she shall cause fence-viewers to arbitrate under subsection 4 (2) of the Act. 3. Form 3: the notice given by the clerk of a municipality to fence-viewers that they are required to meet and arbitrate under subsection 4 (2) of the Act. 4. Form 4: the award by fence-viewers under subsection 8 (1) of the Act. 5. Form 5: the notice of appeal served by an owner under subsection 10 (1) of the Act. 6. Form 6: the affidavit of service of a notice of appeal to be filed by an owner under subsection 10 (1) of the Act. 7. Form 7: the notice given by the clerk of a municipality, or another designated person, to an owner or occupant that he or she shall cause fence-viewers to reattend under subsection 11 (8) of the Act. 8. Form 8: the notice given by the clerk of a municipality to fence-viewers that they are required to reattend under subsection 11 (8) of the Act. 9. Form 9: the certificate by fence-viewers under clause 12 (1) (a) of the Act certifying the default of the adjoining owner and the value of the work. 10. Form 10: the certificate by fence-viewers under clause 12 (1) (b) of the Act certifying the default of the adjoining owner and the amount payable by the adjoining owner. 11. Form 11: the notice under subsection 12 (8) of the Act by the treasurer of a municipality to an adjoining owner against whom an award is being enforced that a payment has been made. 12. Form 12: the determination with directions made by fence-viewers under subsection 13 (6) of the Act. 13. Form 13: the decision prepared by fence-viewers under subsection 14 (1) of the Act that no award or no certificate or determination with directions shall be made. 14. Form 14: the agreement in writing between owners under section 16 of the Act. 15. Form 15: the agreement in writing between a municipality or a local board with owners of adjoining land under subsection 23 (3) of the Act. (2) The forms prescribed by subsection (1) are the forms dated January, 2015 that are available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository under the listing for the Ministry of Municipal Affairs and Housing. O. Reg. 274/15, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The following forms are prescribed as the required forms for the purposes indicated:

1. Form 1: the notice to the clerk of the local municipality that the owner desires fence-viewers to view and arbitrate under subsection 4 (1) of the Act.

2. Form 2: the notice by the clerk of a municipality or by another designated person to an owner or occupant that he or she shall cause fence-viewers to arbitrate under subsection 4 (2) of the Act.

3. Form 3: the notice given by the clerk of a municipality to fence-viewers that they are required to meet and arbitrate under subsection 4 (2) of the Act.

4. Form 4: the award by fence-viewers under subsection 8 (1) of the Act.

5. Form 5: the notice of appeal served by an owner under subsection 10 (1) of the Act.

6. Form 6: the affidavit of service of a notice of appeal to be filed by an owner under subsection 10 (1) of the Act.

7. Form 7: the notice given by the clerk of a municipality, or another designated person, to an owner or occupant that he or she shall cause fence-viewers to reattend under subsection 11 (8) of the Act.

8. Form 8: the notice given by the clerk of a municipality to fence-viewers that they are required to reattend under subsection 11 (8) of the Act.

9. Form 9: the certificate by fence-viewers under clause 12 (1) (a) of the Act certifying the default of the adjoining owner and the value of the work.

10. Form 10: the certificate by fence-viewers under clause 12 (1) (b) of the Act certifying the default of the adjoining owner and the amount payable by the adjoining owner.

11. Form 11: the notice under subsection 12 (8) of the Act by the treasurer of a municipality to an adjoining owner against whom an award is being enforced that a payment has been made.

12. Form 12: the determination with directions made by fence-viewers under subsection 13 (6) of the Act.

13. Form 13: the decision prepared by fence-viewers under subsection 14 (1) of the Act that no award or no certificate or determination with directions shall be made.

14. Form 14: the agreement in writing between owners under section 16 of the Act.

15. Form 15: the agreement in writing between a municipality or a local board with owners of adjoining land under subsection 23 (3) of the Act.

(2) The forms prescribed by subsection (1) are the forms dated January, 2015 that are available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository under the listing for the Ministry of Municipal Affairs and Housing. O. Reg. 274/15, s. 1.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
